item.title: Paper Acceptance
item.description: Congratulations to Dr. Jing Liu for his paper entitled Distributional and Spatial-Temporal Robust Representation Learning for Transportation Activity Recognition was accepted to Pattern Recognition. I was listed as the co-first author.

item.title: Paper Acceptance
item.description: Congratulations to Dr. Bobo Ju for his paper entitled A Novel Cell Contour Based Instance Segmentation Model and Its Applications in HER2 Breast CancerDiscrimination was accepted to Biomedical Signal Processing and Control. I was listed as the second author.

item.title: Paper Acceptance
item.description: The paper entitled “OSIN: Object-centric Scene Inference Network for Unsupervised Video Anomaly Detection” was accepted to IEEE Signal Processing Letters. I was the first author.
